abstract: Carl C. Icahn this week bought deeper into Motorola, lifting his holdings to about 10.6 percent, according to an S.E.C. filing.
snippet: Carl C. Icahn this week bought deeper into Motorola, lifting his holdings to about 10.6 percent, according to an S.E.C. filing.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn this week bought deeper into Motorola, lifting his holdings to about 10.6 percent, according to a filing made to the Securities and Exchange Commission. Mr. Icahn spent $86.2 million on acquiring the shares.

headline.main: Icahn Dials Up More Motorola Shares
